job.title: Experienced Back-End Developer for Advanced Shopify Mobile App Project
job.description:
We are currently on the lookout for a talented Back-End Developer to join our team for an exciting project: developing a custom Shopify mobile app with innovative features like AI-based recommendations and social networking integration. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in server-side logic, database management, and API integration.

Responsibilities:

•  Develop and maintain the server-side logic of the mobile app.
Ensure high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.
•  Create and manage database schemas that represent and support business processes.
•  Implement data storage solutions (including databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc.).
•  Integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system.
•  Integrate user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.
•  Optimize the application for maximum speed and scalability.
Implement security and data protection measures.
•  Design and implement data storage solutions.
•  Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders.

Qualifications:

•  Proficient knowledge of a back-end programming language (e.g., Ruby, Python, Java, .NET, Node.js).
•  Understanding of Shopify’s back-end systems and APIs.
•  Familiarity with front-end technologies (like HTML, CSS, JavaScript) to understand the front-end developer’s needs.
•  Management of hosting environment, including database administration and scaling applications to support load changes.
•  Data migration, transformation, and scripting.
•  Proficiency in code versioning tools, such as Git.
•  Understanding of “session management” in a distributed server environment.
•  Experience with creating RESTful APIs.
•  Knowledge of security compliance and best practices.

What We Offer:

•  A chance to work on a unique, innovative project in the e-commerce space.
•  A collaborative and dynamic work environment.
•  Competitive compensation.

Application Process:

If you are interested, please apply with your resume and a cover letter. Additionally, include a portfolio or examples of your previous work, especially highlighting any e-commerce or Shopify-related projects.

We look forward to your application and potentially welcoming you to our dynamic team!

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for an experienced back-end developer to join our team for an advanced Shopify mobile app project. This is a long-term position, with a duration of more than 6 months.

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in back-end development, with expertise in MySQL, Git, data protection, Shopify, Node.js, AWS Amplify, Shopify development, RESTful API, and Ruby on Rails.

As a back-end developer, your main responsibility will be to develop and maintain the server-side logic of our Shopify mobile app. You will be working closely with our front-end team to ensure seamless integration and a smooth user experience.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing your experience and how you can contribute to the project. Additionally, please include links to some of your past completed projects that showcase your back-end development skills.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and discussing the project further.
